bwwExcerpt: Daniels turns in the finely tuned, down-to-earth performance we've come to expect from him: It's a very Jeff Daniels kind of portrait. Yet his courtroom scenes course with raw emotion and scenes at home pack genuine sweetness. And if he doesn't quite make Atticus Finch his own, the way Peck did, well, who could?
